title: Sekirara Hime to Minus Ouji
original_name: セキララ姫とマイナス王子
sinopse:
Henjo: Hen na Joshikousei Amaguri Senko spin-off that centers around Momoki Riri's daily life as the "Boner Princess" at her school while the transfer student Onodera Shouta who, thanks to Momoki, gained the title "Impotent Prince," does his best to ensure no harms come to her due to her blunt, reckless words.

(Source: MU, edited)
